item.description:
A good GPS address to use is: 91 County Rd. North Falmouth, MA. Which is the bike shop nearby. The biking parking lot is next to the RR tracks on County Rd. Extra parking is available at the library.

Directions: 495 S becomes Rte. 25 E

After Bourne Bridge, enter rotory 2nd exit Rte. 28 S [4 mi.]

Next rotory off on 1st. exit Rte. 28 A [short]

Left to stay on Rte. 28 A [3 mi.]

Right turn on to County Rd. [Short]

After RxR tracks, right turn into biking parking lot.
item.why: A beautiful ride along the ocean waterfront. Eat out afterwards. No. Falmouth to Woods Hole. Slow pace..
item.name: Ride the Shining Sea Trail
